pages.text: Most recipes in your altar require Gemstone Powder as a source of magical energy.$(br2)Gemstone Powder comes in various colors and can be acquired by pulverizing gemstone shards via $(l:general/anvil_crushing)Anvil Crushing$().

pages.title: Mixing Colors
pages.text: There is nothing more important to a upcoming artist than mixing the right paint.$(br)Unfortunately, you found that in the case of your Gemstone Powder, it's not nearly as easy as it initially seemed: The powders don't quite want to mix. The result is always a multicolored mass.$(br)$(l:general/color_mixing)You need an intermediate solution$().
